user.title: Connect to Ampæra
user.description: Enter your API key from Settings → API in the Ampæra web app. Leave API URL empty to use production ({default_url}).

mode.title: Installation Mode
mode.description: Choose how you want to use Ampæra. **Real Devices** connects to your actual smart devices (EV charger, water heater, etc.). **Simulation** creates demo devices for testing without affecting real hardware. These modes are mutually exclusive.

data_description.installation_mode: Real Devices: Production use with physical devices. Simulation: Demo/testing with simulated devices.

location.title: Configure Site
location.description: Set your site name and select your electricity grid region for accurate spot pricing.

devices.title: Select Devices
devices.description: Choose which Home Assistant devices to sync with Ampæra. Found {device_count} compatible devices. Only real physical devices are shown - no simulated devices.

simulation.title: Configure Simulation
simulation.description: Configure your simulated household for demos and testing. This creates realistic appliances (dishwasher, oven, washing machine, water heater, EV charger, etc.) with Norwegian daily consumption patterns - all running locally in Home Assistant.

data_description.simulation_household_profile: Affects consumption patterns, timing, and appliance usage
data_description.simulation_water_heater_type: Old heaters have no temperature sensor, smart heaters have full control

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Ampæra
reauth_confirm.description: Your API key has expired. Please enter a new API key.

error.no_devices_found: No compatible devices found in Home Assistant
error.no_devices_selected: Please select at least one device

abort.already_configured: This Home Assistant instance is already configured

init.title: Ampæra Settings
init.description: Configure integration behavior and synchronization settings. Available options depend on your installation mode.

data_description.polling_interval: How often to push telemetry data to Ampæra
data_description.command_poll_interval: How often to check for pending commands
data_description.device_sync_interval: How often to sync device state
data_description.enable_voltage_sensors: Only available in Real Device mode
data_description.dev_mode: Shows advanced debugging options and simulation dashboard
data_description.simulation_household_profile: Family uses more power, students less, retirees have different schedules
data_description.simulation_water_heater_type: Old (dumb) vs Smart affects available controls and sensors
